name: Space Dungeons! (DEMO)
description:
A brave human decides to go into space and explore, finding another spaceship, thinking it's an abandoned one, accidentally enters the mothership of an alien species. Unfortunately, any foreign creature entering the mothership will have a secret bomb placed onto them which will explode in 2 minutes. To deactivate this bomb and to go to another room is to collect 4 coins.

CONTROLS FOR PC:

WASD to move, enter to pause. Move mouse to aim and left click to shoot.

CONTROLS FOR CONSOLE:

Left Stick to move, right stick to aim, start to pause, right trigger to shoot.
